tool.name: Pplacer
tool.description: Makes a placement using pplacer maximum likelihood algorithm

param.name: inputtree
param.label: Reference tree
param.help: Tree made with RAxML or PhyMl using the reference sequences

param.name: inputstat
param.label: Tree info file
param.help: This file is generated when making a tree with RAxML or PhyMl. Make sure to check it first with the tool Info File Check

param.name: inputcombo
param.label: Aligned reads to reference MSA (HMM) in stockholm format
param.help: You can convert your file format with the tool Convbioseq

tool.help:
=========== Overview: ===========
Placement of reads on a reference tree using the pplacer algorithm.
Reads must be prealigned to a reference alignment with HMM, and the file in stockholm format.
Pplacer needs an info/stat file to know the evolutionary model for placement.
----
.. class:: infomark
For further informations, please visite the pplacer documentation : http://matsen.github.io/pplacer/
